splib.util

Class MinHeap<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • splib.util.MinHeap<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PriorityQueue

    public class MinHeap<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    A minimum heap, keyed with integers, holding elements of type E.
